nodes.text: Star Wars: Purge: The Tyrant's Fist

Star Wars: Purge: The Tyrant's Fist is the fourth story arc of the Star Wars: Purge comic series. It was written by Alexander Freed and the first issue was published by Dark Horse Comics on December 5, 2012. Contrary to the other Purge story arcs, The Tyrant's Fist was a two-part story. It covered the adventures of Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader during the Vaklin insurgency.
